overview:
Frank Grasso, founder of e-channel Search, has worked in Search Engine Marketing (SEM) since the early days of AltaVista and Lycos. Grasso started his search career in Melbourne Australia in 1999, consulting to early adopters of SEM where he developed a reputation in the APAC e-commerce industry for his outstanding work with travel and retail websites.

Grasso worked as a Search Engine Marketing consultant until 2002, when he moved to Adelaide, South Australia, to form e-channel Search. In 2005, Grasso undertook his Masters in Marketing at the University of South Australia, whilst setting up a technology team and developing the multi award winning DynamicCreativeâ„¢ software.

Grasso now heads e-channel Search, which is one of Australiaâ€™s leading internet marketing agencies servicing some of Australiaâ€™s largest travel, retail and classifieds online goods and services. In 2010, e-channel expanded internationally, servicing Asia Pacific, the United States and Europe.

A Champion writer with Digital Ministry, avid blogger and highly sought after speaker, Grasso most recently presented at PhoCusWright in the US, one of the worldâ€™s largest travel innovation summits. The presentation can be viewed here; http://www.echannelsearch.com/
